bio.title: My Story
bio.paragraph1: I'm a Java Backend Developer with over 8 years of experience building and maintaining large-scale backend systems. I'm passionate about creating efficient and scalable technical solutions.
bio.paragraph2: Throughout my career, I've worked with various technologies, from traditional frameworks to modern cloud technologies. I'm always looking for opportunities to learn and apply the latest technologies.
bio.paragraph3: Besides software development, I'm passionate about sharing knowledge through blogging and mentoring young developers. I believe that sharing knowledge helps the community grow stronger.

sourceSelector.title: Select Quiz

sourceSelector.urlLabel: URL of JSON file containing questions:

sourceSelector.reqOptionFields: Each option must have text and isCorrect
sourceSelector.reqOneCorrect: Only one option should have isCorrect: true
